about_the_game:
This DLC pack is a gift for our players, as a thank you for your support!
Contains digital items included:
Free add-on: The “OPG” skin set Just add it to your library.
detailed_description:
This DLC pack is a gift for our players, as a thank you for your support!
Contains digital items included:
Free add-on: The “OPG” skin set Just add it to your library.
name: OPG: Clan Wars - Premium Status Upgrade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This content requires the base game OPG: Clan Wars on Steam in order to play
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian*, Turkish, Japanese, Korean, Czech
*languages with full audio support
